query: Mt Tam Pediatric Dentistry Corte Madera CA usa
name: Mt Tam Pediatric Dentistry
full_address: 770 Tamalpais Dr Suite 317, Corte Madera, CA 94925
description:
A boutique pediatric dental experience designed to make family trips to the dentist simple and fun.

We know that rushing your kids is often only met with them pushing back. That is why we developed an approach that lets us meet your family where you’re at - whether you’re a busy parent or an anxious kid. We’ve thought through everything to simplify your kid’s dental care.

We can't wait to learn about what makes your family smile!

reviews_data.review_text: What a wonderful experience. This is the first time my daughter has been to the dentist and everyone there was so sweet. My daughter sat so patiently and listened to the dental assistant and dentist. There is a TV to watch as an option for the kids as they are getting their teeth cleaned. The dentist even brings in her bunny Milkshake once a week. Also the dentist is very well designed if you are into to that.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We love seeing kids succeed and your daughter certainly did! It is wonderful to hear that you both felt comfortable in and enjoyed our physical space. It's one of the many subtle ways we help ease children into the process and we're so glad it made an impact! Thanks for choosing and supporting us :)

reviews_data.review_text: I cannot recommend them enough. From the initial appointment to the day of my daughter’s treatment, Dr. Stephanie and her assistant was phenomenal. Stephanie patiently listened to our concerns and addressed all our questions. We came to Mt Tam after visiting another pediatric dentist who told us they will only treat my daughter with general anesthesia. Stephanie came up with a treatment plan that seemed best for my daughter and was able to successfully treat my daughter’s cavity without GA. She and her AMAZING assistant(unicorn-tier for working with children) calmed my anxious 6 year old, who I honestly wasn’t sure would be able to sit thru the procedure and worked their magic. Look no further for a solid dentist. She checks all the boxes—credentials, skills, chairside manner, and a pleasant human being :)
reviews_data.owner_answer: We cannot thank you enough for these kind words as they mean everything to us! This is all we strive for as a practice and we are so grateful for your support and recognition. Sincere thanks for your kindness :)

reviews_data.review_text: What a delightful dentist office and experience! We’ve been to a couple others with little success and from the moment we walked in we felt welcomed and treated with calm, knowledgeable and kind interactions from the reception/hygienist (Evelyn) and dentist Stephanie. Not only was the setup incredibly age appropriate but the information they shared about flossing, snacks and hygiene routines was super informative. So glad we found our way here!
reviews_data.owner_answer: What a meaningful review :) We are so glad you and your daughter had a good experience. We strive to do children's dentistry differently and it's amazing to receive feedback like this. Hopefully we've made and will continue to make a difference in your child's lifelong dental journey!

reviews_data.review_text:
The Mt. Tam Pediatric Dentistry team made my son's first dentist experience fun and straightforward! The office environment is warm and modern, yet young-at-heart and engaging for kids.

Dr. Stephanie and her team have an excellent rapport with kids. They make it fun, easy and explain what's going on in simple terms to which kids can relate.

Let's keep this review short.

GO SEE DR. STEPHANIE! She's excellent, and we'll absolutely be back in six months for our next check-up!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Ben! It was a pleasure seeing you and your son at the office and are happy you chose us for his "dental home!"

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Stephanie and her team are the best! They are so professional, caring and thorough. My kids actually LIKE going to see the dentist because of Dr. Stephanie and her team.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Yay!! This is our ultimate purpose and goal as pediatric providers. These kiddos have a lifetime of dentistry ahead of them so setting up a positive foundation from a young age is critical. We feel so lucky to be a part of their journey and are so glad we are making an impact on yours! Thank you for this kind shout out :)

reviews_data.review_text: What a fantastic office, staff, and dentist! From the moment you walk through the door, the office and the staff are calming and welcoming. My kids and I were comfortable from the get-go, and our experience only got better. Dr. Stephanie and her team were kind and funny and had a great rapport with both my kids. Dr. Stephanie discussed treatment options and pros and cons thoroughly and without pressure. And to top it all off, my kids came home and flossed without being asked! We are so glad to have this new, top-notch pediatric dentist in our community!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much, Jaime! We're so proud of your kids for flossing all by themselves! Nice job kiddos!

reviews_data.review_text: What a great dentistry experience!  We have been visiting Mt. Tam Pediatric for over a year now and have had nothing but excellent care.  Professional, responsive, proactive dental care..the lst goes on.
reviews_data.owner_answer: It is a pleasure to work with your family! And we are so glad you are enjoying the experience :) Thanks so much for this kind feedback.

reviews_data.review_text: Thanks for making our daughter feel so at ease for her first appointment and giving us the truth about dried mango and puffs. 😬
reviews_data.owner_answer: Yay! You are so welcome. It's so wonderful when parents take our messages to heart. It will make a world of difference in your LO's oral health. We are so glad you and she had a positive visit :)

reviews_data.review_text: Grateful to be getting care here! Our little guy is sensitive to stressors and tends to do poorly with appointments, sitting still, being touched, and unexpected noises. It's a relief to be able to bring him to a clinic that invests so much care into working around these barriers, and we hope to continue as patients for a long time to come!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We hope to work with your family for a long time too :) You are wonderful with your son and provided us with great information to succeed as a team.  It takes a village, and we are honored to be a part of yours.

reviews_data.review_text:
Amazing experience! Dr. Stephanie and team were fantastic! They all made our daughter feel comfortable in every detail of our experience there. We opened the door and the first thing we see is Milkshake, the office bunny. My daughter, who was hesitant to walk in, was immediately excited. The entire team has a seemless way to communicate with kids, they know their "language" and can make them feel special and part of the process.

Thank you all!
reviews_data.owner_answer: You are so kind to notice and share the subtleties that helped make your daughters experience so positive. Recognition for this type of thing always makes us smile :) We are so glad it had a helpful impact on her dental experience. She sure is a sweet girl.

reviews_data.review_text: Dr Stephanie and the team take great care of our kids. They are sensitive to each individual child’s needs and exercise great patience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks, Michael! We appreciate you noticing how the “Tam Way” is tailored to each child. We enjoy connecting with the kids in a special and unique way. Always happy to go at the pace they need :)

reviews_data.review_text: I love this place! The staff is so incredibly nice and welcoming. I had so much fear for bringing my 2 year old to the dentist but she absolutely loves it! They put “sparkles” on her teeth and explain all of the tools beforehand. They are absolutely amazing and Dr. Stephanie is fantastic and thorough. My daughter actually loves going to the dentist, which I would have never imagined!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks for the kind words, Haley! We're so happy your 2yo loved having sparkles on her teeth. And no review is better than a 2yo that loves coming to see the dentist!

reviews_data.review_text: We had the BEST experience at Mt Tam Pediatric Dentistry yesterday! It was our four year old daughters first dentist visit and I could not be happier! The office is adorable and the staff so welcoming! I was pleasantly surprised that my energizer bunny actually sat in the chair for close to an hour!! They explained everything as they went and she felt so comfortable as did I! We can't wait for our next visit! Thank you so very much Dr Stephanie and team for the amazing experience!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for the kind review, Kristen! We're happy that you and your little bunny not only enjoyed the office, but felt the warmth we provide in the experience. We look forward to seeing you both soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely fantastic from the office to the staff to the bedside manner. My 2.5 year old can’t stop talking about how great it was at the dentist and asking when he can go back. He’s even excited to floss. So glad I found Dr. Stephanie and the Tam Team.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Your little guy was pretty amazing himself! And you did some great prep w/ him 🙌🏻 We are so glad we get to be his dental team 😊

reviews_data.review_text: If you have a kiddo who needs a dentist, choose Dr. Stephanie! Her whole office and the appointment experience has been so thoughtfully designed for kids - all the way up to a TV in the ceiling with kids' content so that they will be excited to lay down for the cleaning. She and her team are also just wonderful people who are delightful to deal with. My 3-year-old, hilariously, loves going to the dentist!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Audrey! We can't wait to see you and your little one again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely the best! Clean, beautiful office and Dr Stephanie and staff are incredible! Highly recommend. My shy 2 year old had her first appointment here and now LOVES the dentist. As a mama, I couldn’t be happier with our experience.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Gillian - we are very glad you found us through Heidi. What a small world! Your kind words meant the world to us and more importantly...that your little one now loves the dentist!

reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful experience! It was my two year olds first visit to the dentist and Dr. Stephanie was so sweet, reading her ques to make her feel comfortable. The aesthetic of the dentist office was like none I’ve ever seen. Super kid friendly and beautiful! Would highly recommend, we can’t wait to go back to the dentist! (Never thought I’d say that)
reviews_data.owner_answer: Kristin - thanks for the kind words. We are excited to know that you can't wait to come back... we feel the same!

reviews_data.review_text: Absolutely amazing.  I never thought I could love a dentist visit so much.  They were so pleasant and kind.  There was even a bunny rabbit in the office for the kids to feed :). Can’t wait to go back!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you and your sweet LO enjoyed the visit. What a great little personality she has. We really enjoyed her too :)

reviews_data.review_text: Dr. Stephanie and her team are amazing. Evelyn was so great with our little. Office is clean, friendly and educational. Our little one left happy after his cleaning. Highly recommend!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Ashley - We are truly happy that you saw exactly what our office aims to provide: A comfortable, friendly, and educational approach to kids teeth! We also agree that Evelyn is great and look forward to seeing you soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Simply put, you cannot do better for your children's pediatric dentistry than Dr. Stephanie. The whole dentist visit with her and her team was such a pleasant experience for our kids and us as well. Located in the Corte Madera Town Center, the office is immediately at a place of comfort for the family (easy parking and other fun things to do there!). We checked in through a text so when we were up at the office, it was an easy experience. The office is decorated like a beautiful home so the children immediately felt at ease. Dr. Stephanie's team was very kind and thorough throughout the process (which was our 2 year old's first ever visit!). Dr. Stephanie herself has such a passion and love for her job and children, it made the experience great for all of us. You will be very glad you chose Dr. Stephanie!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for the kind words, Ryan! We are glad you had a great experience and look forward to seeing you and your family again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: Another great visit with Dr. Stephanie and her staff. My son needed some sealants and a cavity filled - they were so gentle and worked FAST! When I asked my son afterward how he thought the visit went, he said, "Great!" - So glad we found Mt. Tam Pediatric Dentistry!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Nicole, we're ecstatic you and your son had another "great" visit! Thank you for your kind words and we will see you both soon.

reviews_data.review_text: This place is wonderful. It's a calm, inviting and beautifully-designed space that really understands how to help kids feel comfortable with the new & strange experience of getting their teeth checked. My 21mo had a great time with Dr. Stephanie and he now loves saying the word "dentist" — I think his review says it all!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks so much Michelle! We appreciate the kinds words and your support. Looking forward to seeing you again soon :)

reviews_data.review_text: What a wonderful experience we have had with the Mt Tam team and Dr. Stephanie. They have been so great with my daughter since she started seeing them at 2 years old. She is always excited to return. Thank you for taking such good care of my girl!
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Bethany,
Thank you so much for the kind words - they mean the world to our team! We are delighted to hear that she is excited to come visit Dr. Stephanie and the Tam Team. You are VERY welcome.

reviews_data.review_text: Our kids have been going to Dr Stephanie since we moved to Marin and everyone there is extremely friendly and professional. Both kids are happy customers!
reviews_data.owner_answer: The Kelly family is a pleasure to work with. Your boys are so polite and kind. Lucky to be their dentist :)

reviews_data.review_text: We really enjoyed the visit with my toddler. They did a good job making the dentist visit fun, and gently brushing and checking his teeth. I m glad we found this place!
reviews_data.owner_answer: We are so glad you found us too! Your son did great and we are so glad he enjoyed his visit. Going to the dentist really can be fun :)

reviews_data.review_text: My 2 year old looks forward to coming to the dentist. The whole experience was warm, inviting, calm and comfortable from beginning to end
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, Amy! We're excited that your little girl enjoyed her time in our office. And, from one local business owner to another - this means so much to me :)

reviews_data.review_text: Best pediatric dentist we've ever had :-) Professional, nice, quick.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thanks Mike! We're very happy to be your favorites and look forward to seeing you again soon.

reviews_data.review_text: Highly recommend this pediatric dentistry!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much Leslie. We look forward to seeing your family in the office again soon!
It was a pleasure to see your son in our office, Dr. Sotoodeh!
Thanks so much for your support and for trusting us with your VERY cute LO. We appreciate you sharing your experience with others :)
